block.p: KOSSOFF-Burton. The Cystic Fibrosis Center at Saint Vincents Hospital mourns the loss of Burt Kossoff, dear friend and great benefactor of the CF community. Burt's compassion and generosity has enabled countless young people to achieve their goals and dreams in spite of their daily struggle with Cystic Fibrosis. We will miss the kind and gracious presence of this wonderful man. Our deepest condolences to Burt's beloved wife Phyllis and the entire Kossoff family. Maria Berdella, M.D. Patricia Walker, M.D. and Staff
